detaileddescription.para: This DO-178C template provides an overview of the documents required as acceptable mean of compliance.

The aim of the project is also to demonstrate the use of strictdoc integrating:
diagrams
images
bitfields
Doxygen
Generating pdf and html via Sphinx, publication to Read The Doc
For this purpose, a toy example is used.

Requirements: aptinstallninja-build pipinstallsphinx pipinstallsphinx_rtd_theme pipinstallbit-field pipinstallcairosvg aptinstalldoxygen pipinstallbreathe aptinstalllatexmk aptinstalltexlive-latex-base aptinstalltexlive-fonts-recommended aptinstalltexlive-latex-extra

known limitations:
requirement shall have a title to get proper sphinx cross reference.
Doxygen directives not yet supported by strictdoc 0.0.40, in the backlog
assets img.* not displayed by strictdoc 0.0.40, in the backlog.
